name: Kaeri
description: Kaeri is an ERC20 token that aims to build on the vision of the great master to offer teh people a better option than "dragons". Kaeri means The Comeback. It’s a return to the roots — the roots of the vision, the roots of the community and the roots of oneself. The Mahamudra practice in four words: view, meditation, conduct and fruition. We are nobody but we have a vision, and we are sharing this vision with you. We are building on the seeds of ideas of the great master. Together, as a decentralized community of devs and followers, we can move mountains.
